ぶるぶる: (buruburu) - trembling (com medo, raiva, etc.), shivering (with cold), shaking, quivering
ぶるり: (ぶるり) - with a vroom; with a sudden shaking
ぶるるん: (ぶるるん) - va-va-vroom (esp. fast cars or bikes, sexy women or men)/va-voom/vrrrm; sound of animal shaking its fur to dry off after getting wet (esp. dogs)
ぶるん: (ぶるり) - with a vroom; with a sudden shaking
ぶれ: (ブレ) - camera shake/picture blur; deviation/slight shifting
ぶれる: (ブレる) - to be blurred (photo, video, etc.)/for a camera to be shaken; to waver (in one's beliefs, policy, etc.); to shift (position)/to be slightly off
ぶん投げる: (ぶんなげる) - to throw (strongly, violently, etc.)
ぶん殴る: (ぶんなぐる) - to knock; to hit hard; to give a hard blow; to wallop; to sock
ぶ厚い: (ぶあつい) - bulky; massive; thick; heavy
ぷいっと: (ぷいっと) - abruptly; suddenly in a bad mood; in a huff
ぷいと: (ぷいっと) - abruptly; suddenly in a bad mood; in a huff
ぷかり: (ぷかりぷかり) - puffing (e.g. cigarette smoke); bobbing (to the surface)/floating lightly
ぷかりぷかり: (ぷかりぷかり) - puffing (e.g. cigarette smoke); bobbing (to the surface)/floating lightly
ぷくぷく: (ぷくぷく) - bubblingly/foamingly/sinking or rising while giving off bubbles; cute and chubby/pudgy/puffed up
ぷすぷす: (ぶすぶす) - sputtering/smoldering; repeated thrusting into something (sword, needle, etc.)/pricking repeatedly; (ブスブス, ぶすぶす only)  mutterings of discontent/faint sounds of complaint
ぷちぷち: (プチプチ) - sound of bubbles (or other small objects) being popped; lumpy sensation (e.g. of food); little bits/small grains; (プチプチ only)  bubble wrap (trademark of Kawakami Sangyo Co.)
ぷっつり: (ふつり) - breaking off/snapping off; (ふっつり, ぷっつり, ふつり only)  suddenly stopping
ぷっつん: (ぷっつん) - weird/crazy/losing common sense/snapping; sound of a stretched string snapping
ぷっと: (ぷっと) - puffing motion (when blowing, spitting, etc.); pouting (with displeasure)
ぷつぷつ: (ぷつぷつ) - bumpy (e.g. of a rash)/knobbly/pimply; easily cut
ぷつん: (ぷつん) - snap (sound of something being suddenly and irreversibly broken)
ぷよぷよすくい: (ぷよぷよすくい) - jelly ball scooping (festival game)
ぷりぷり: (ぶりぶり) - angrily/in a huff/in anger; high on marijuana; (プリプリ, ぷりぷり only) tender (to chew)
ぷりぷりして: (ぷりぷりして) - in an angry mood; in anger; angrily; in a huff
ぷりぷり怒る: (ぷりぷりおこる) - to be in a huff
ぷるぷる: (プルプル) - yielding, soft, elastic; jiggle, bounce, slightly trembling
ぷるん: (プルン) - shaking like a jelly; jellylike
ぷるんぷるん: (プルンプルン) - shaking like a jelly; jellylike
ぷんぷん: (ぷんぷん) - intense smell (hanging around); state of being furious or angry
ぷんぷんして: (ぷんぷんして) - in an angry mood; in anger; angrily; in a huff
ぷー: (プーっ) - toot (e.g. of trumpet); honk (e.g. of klaxon)/beep; farting sound; sound of something being inflated/puff/poof/phoo
ぷーっ: (プーっ) - toot (e.g. of trumpet); honk (e.g. of klaxon)/beep; farting sound; sound of something being inflated/puff/poof/phoo
ぷー太郎: (プータロー) - unemployed person; vagabond/floater/vagrant; (風太郎 only) day labourer, esp. on the docks
へいへい: (へいへい) - yeah, yeah (used for casual, half-hearted, or insincere agreement)/sure; hey!; (はいはい only) hello (on phone, replying to "moshimoshi"); (はいはい only)  giddy-up (to a horse)/gee-up/giddap
へきへき: (へきへき) - being gobsmacked; being struck dumb; being fed up with something
へき地: (へきち) - remote place; backcountry; the sticks; hinterland
へこたれる: (へこたれる) - (occ. written 凹たれる) to lose heart; to be discouraged; to be exhausted; to be tired out
へしこ: (へしこ) - fish pickled in rice-bran paste (esp. mackerel)
へしむくれ: (へちゃもくれ) - term of abuse about someone's looks, etc.
へし折る: (へしおる) - to smash; to break
へそで茶を沸かす: (へそでちゃをわかす) - to do something ridiculous; to do something bizarre; to boil tea in one's navel
へそを曲げる: (へそをまげる) - to get angry; to become perverse
へそ出しルック: (へそだしルック) - bare midriff; bare midriff look
へそ曲がり: (hesomagari) - perversidade, personalidade perversa, pessoa perversa, pessoa difícil, pessoa teimosa
へたの横好き: (へたのよこずき) - being crazy about something but being very bad at it
へたばる: (へたばる) - to be exhausted; to be worn out
へたへた: (へたへた) - falling down; lacking the energy to stand; collapsing
へたり込む: (へたりこむ) - to sit down hard; to sink down to the floor
へたる: (へたる) - to fall on one's backside; to be exhausted; to lose strength; to lose one's abilities
へちむくれ: (へちゃもくれ) - term of abuse about someone's looks, etc.
へちゃむくれ: (へちゃもくれ) - term of abuse about someone's looks, etc.
へちゃもくれ: (へちゃもくれ) - term of abuse about someone's looks, etc.
へったくれ: (へったくれ) - (often as as 〜もへったくれもない, etc.) to hell with; be damned
へっぴり腰: (へっぴりごし) - bent back/prone posture; weak-kneed/timidity/lack of nerve
へとへと: (へとへと) - completely exhausted; dead tired; knackered
へどが出る: (へどがでる) - to be nauseating; to be disgusting; to be revolting
へどもど: (へどもど) - flustered; flurried; stuttering (e.g. an apology)

へのへのもへの: (へのへのもへの) - groups of hiragana characters which are arranged to look like a face
への字: (へのじ) - mouth shaped like a kana "he" character; mouth turned down at the corners
への字に結んだ口: (へのじにむすんだくち) - mouth shaped like a kana "he" character; mouth turned down at the corners
へばる: (へばる) - to be exhausted; to be worn out
へびつかい座: (へびつかいざ) - {astron} Ophiuchus (constellation); the Serpent Bearer
へへののもへじ: (へのへのもへの) - groups of hiragana characters which are arranged to look like a face

へまをやる: (へまをやる) - to commit a blunder
